description:
Future growth for Yarram is imminent in the short to medium term. Not only are there future plans to create further housing but future nationally funded projects auger well for families or investors committing to the area.

We are offering two independent homes of high quality and amenities.
Firstly, the main features of the main home include:

- Modern kitchen with electric cooktop, built in wall oven, built in pantry and dishwasher. Beautiful benchtops complete the kitchen
-Three generous sized bedrooms. Each with BIR's
-Two family/living areas of large proportions
-Heating and cooling: ceiling fans in bedroom 2 and 3, master with split system and another split system in living/family room.
- Both bathrooms have near new appointments and bath within main.
-Separate laundry room
-Enclosed backyard featuring garden shed, children's cubby house and entertainment area.
-Large sheds (2) capable of housing boats, caravans, and machinery.
-Bungalow or fourth bedroom

Second home: (Built in 2011 with wide verandahs and merbau decking)
-A further Three bedrooms, all featuring built in robes, ceiling fans and carpeted throughout.
-Modern bathroom with shower, plenty of bench space and storage and beautifully tiled.
-Modern kitchen with large walk-in pantry and electric appliances with Caesarstone benchtops
-Open plan living dining and lounge area.
-Separate laundry room with rear door access to verandah
-Separate enclosed yard

Additional features include
-Solar features on both homes
-Two large sheds, both have power and concrete floors with roller door access
-Mature gardens. and lovely rural views to the south.

The beauty of these homes being that they can serve a multitude of uses.
Live in one and permanently lease the other. Create your own business opportunity as the location is ideal for a short-term Airbnb. Alternatively, an ideal opportunity for large family situations.

Both homes are positioned on a full acre of land, have town water, and are excellently presented. The vendors are willing to include high quality furniture in the sale for the second home making this a simple short term lease proposition.

No matter what your thoughts or intentions are for a property of this type, to purchase two quality homes on large land is seldom found, let alone in the price range often quoted for a single dwelling.
Do not linger.

For a Due Diligence Checklist go to: consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
